mapper.insert: insert into challenge (user_no, challenge_name, challenge_content, start_date, end_date, point) values (#{userNo}, #{challengeName}, #{challengeContent}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{point})
mapper.select: select max(challenge_no) as challenge_no from challenge
mapper.insert: insert into mission (challenge_no, video_id, video_title, channel_name, video_thumbnail) values (#{challengeNo}, #{videoId}, #{videoTitle}, #{channelName}, #{videoThumbnail})
mapper.update: update challenge set challenge_name = #{challengeName}, challenge_content = #{challengeContent}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, point = #{point} where challenge_no = #{challengeNo}
